ticket.title: destroy method does not work correctly with fixtures
ticket.original-body:
My unit test
@@@ test "destroy should destroy tournaments" do assert_equal 2, @player.players_in_games.size assert @player.destroy assert_equal 0, @player.players_in_games.size end @@@
fails. Whereas the following alternative works like as champ:
@@@ test "destroy should destroy tournaments" do assert_equal 2, @player.players_in_games.size assert Player.destroy(@player.id) assert_equal 0, @player.players_in_games.size end @@@
I expect both forms to work the same way.
My Rails version: 2.3.3

ticket.original-body-html:
My unit test

  test "destroy should destroy tournaments" do
    assert_equal 2, @player.players_in_games.size
    assert @player.destroy
    assert_equal 0, @player.players_in_games.size
  end

fails. Whereas the following alternative works like as champ:

  test "destroy should destroy tournaments" do
    assert_equal 2, @player.players_in_games.size
    assert Player.destroy(@player.id)
    assert_equal 0, @player.players_in_games.size
  end

I expect both forms to work the same way.

My Rails version: 2.3.3
